document.discussion_title: Impressions masterclass with Alistair McGowan and Rory Bremner – video | Stage
document.topic_text: Impressions masterclass with Alistair McGowan and Rory Bremner – video Stephen Moss learns the art of impersonation from two masters: Alistair McGowan and Rory Bremner. Will Moss impress his tutors with his Boris Johnson? Can he manage to stretch his words and perfect the pauses of Dara Ó Briain? And what might My Way sound like performed by Nigel Farage? Plus: McGowan and Bremner share their 10 tips for making a great impression Stephen Moss: How I made an impression on Bremner and McGowan Stephen Moss , Jess Gormley , Tom Silverstone , Noah Payne-Frank and Kara Fox, theguardian.com Wednesday 10 August 2016 09.00 BST Last modified on Wednesday 10 August 2016 12.05 BST Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share via Email Share on LinkedIn Share on Google+ Share on WhatsApp Share on Messenger
document.post: loved the george galloway one , but all very funny and informative .
